tool_description:
Get a random quote in JSON format. 

Current categories are:
- famous
- movies
name: Random Famous Quotes
title: Random Famous Quotes

api_list.name: GET endpoint
api_list.description: Get endpoint for quotes by famous people or from popular movies

optional_parameters.name: cat
optional_parameters.description: Get quotes inside any of these categories:  "movies" or "famous". If not present get quotes from any category.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of quotes to return. If omitted, a single quote will be returned. Max number of quotes is 10
